sources.title: Scandal Sheet (1985) Burt Lancaster TV Movie | Drama
sources.description:
The publisher of a celebrity gossip tabloid sets out to destroy an aging actor, whose career is foundering and who is also facing a battle with alcoholism.

Director: David Lowell Rich
Writer: Howard Rodman
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Lauren Hutton, Pamela Reed
Genres:Â Classics, Drama
